document_data.name: Mother of a Thousand Young
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LJ/An Army of One Thousand|12}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mother of a Thousand Young''' was the mysterious leader of the [[spider katanga]] who allied with the malicious [[outsider]]s known as the [[Tamara (Malatra)|Tamara]]. She and her kin resided within the [[Fire Mountain]] on the [[Malatran Plateau]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LJ/An Army of One Thousand|2}}
document_data.Description: After becoming the Mother of a Thousand Young, her stomach area became bloated and distended with countless egg sacs. She was a monstrous creature who reveled in death and destruction, and her transformation left her ravenous for flesh. The spider katanga rarely spoke, but her speech was as venomous as her bite when she did.
document_data.Abilities:
Despite her bloated appearance, the Mother was a powerful and agile spider katanga. Transformation into the Mother toughened her body similar to the ''[[barkskin]]'' spell, and she received resistance to [[magic]], as well as [[sorcerous]] abilities. Like other spider katanga, the Mother could climb walls with ease. She had a highly [[venom]]ous bite and could spit [[acid]] at her enemies.

Apart from being a powerful [[warrior]], the Mother could tap into [[divine]] and [[arcane]] magics. She always kept defensive spells active on herself, such as ''[[shield of faith]]'' and ''[[mage armor]]''.
document_data.Possessions:
The Mother of a Thousand Young inhabited the area known as the nest within the spider katanga lair on the slopes of the [[Fire Mountain]]. The nest was a cold stone chamber filled with the stench of death and decay. The Mother's nest was a thick mess of webs and parts of her victims' bodies. She sat on a grand throne made out of her victims' skulls.{{Cite organized play/LJ/An Army of One Thousand|11}}

The Mother of a Thousand Young wielded a powerful [[enchanted]] item called the ''[[Runestick of the Tamara]]''. The item allowed a loyal servant of the extradimensional evil to have access to additional arcane spells, such as ''[[cat's grace]]'', ''[[endurance]]'', ''[[fly]]'', ''[[haste]]'', and ''[[see invisibility]]''.
